```{r}
# Load the data
data <- read.csv("../../../posterior_samples/production_posteriorPredictive_test2.csv")
```
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```
```{r}
ggplot(data, aes(x = production)) +
  geom_density(fill = "blue", alpha = 0.5) +
  labs(title = "Posterior predictive distribution of production",
       x = "Production",
       y = "Density")
```
